Hi all,

I used log4j in my application which was deployed on weblogic,i have some
trouble with log4j.

log4j stoped logging when i changed the log file(just changed the content of the
log file,delete/modify/add,whatever), at the same time ,the weblogic is still
running.

after i restard the weblogic,the log4j will work again.

anyway,the log4j won't work unless i restard the weblogic when i change the log
file.

it is very urgent!anybody can help me?

thanks!
